versions.changes:
• Added the Gladiator Background.
  • Added the Village, Netherdeep, and Nomadic Netherling heritages.
• Added three backgrounds: Apothecary, Musician, and Sailor.

• Added Aqualan and Faerie lineages.
  • Added Scavenger background.

• Resolved issues with missing spells and rituals.
  • Added Hallucinate and Dreamsight spells.
• Initial version of game rules, character creation information, spells, equipment.
